attributes.title: No a vibe
attributes.review: I do not recommend downloading this app in all it was a terrible horrendously in adequate app for my standards it took exactly 365 days to fully download and when it downloaded It started playing Tekashi69’s music to which all the rats in my uncles basement started dancing the Macarena to , have a horrible Fear of rodents So bad I started seizing while I was about to die on the floor all the cockroaches from the White House started raping super Bass by Nicki Minaj to which I almost died

attributes.title: Fascist
attributes.review: Spreads and contributes to dangerous mindsets and pushes the belief that America is a great place for all while ignoring the past history and current oppression and prejudice towards minorities. Also keeps Trump’s supporters supporting out of fear over losing their power and privileges in White America. Content displays Fascist ideologies and could potentially become a threat to the entire world. Black Lives Matter. It’s time to be on the right side of history and not regress back to before the Civil Rights Era.

attributes.title: Why😤
attributes.review: This is a horrible app. They want my information to enter the app. And it is making my dog fart. And it stinks and right when I deleted it he STOPPED! Therefore I highly recommend not TO GET IT! And he is RACIST how rude. He is a disgrace to the world. My dog even is not racist. My DOG would be a better president. But the people who gave him a five star just feels bad for him. Oh and there are one  bad word  I learned to day. The T word. Really should not say it fine I will say it. Do-Do-Do - Donald Trump🤐

attributes.title: Watch out 🖤🥺
attributes.review:
The app took FOREVER TO OPEN! This is unacceptable. When the app finally worked ... my phone glitched and I was frightened so much so that I fell off of my bed! 😩🙈I rolled and kept rolling downstairs through the front door where I ended up in my front yard. 🌈✨🌸I almost rolled into the street and a car happened to zoom by. 😦😦😦that was a close call... safe to say I’m never again going to use this app! Everyone pls be careful!!!! 🖤

🤩👶👄🌷🥰❤️

attributes.title: All lives matter, but not Donald’s ✨❤️🧚🏽‍♂️🌈
attributes.review:
Since you have scrolled to my review, Trumpee senpai (uwu), I wanted to show u the first 18 lines of the Chaucer’s Canterbury Tales (owo)

WHAN that Aprille with his shoures soote 
The droghte of Marche hath perced to the roote,
And bathed every veyne in swich licour,
Of which vertu engendred is the flour;
Whan Zephirus eek with his swete breeth        5
Inspired hath in every holt and heeth
The tendre croppes, and the yonge sonne
Hath in the Ram his halfe cours y-ronne,
And smale fowles maken melodye,
That slepen al the night with open ye,        10
(So priketh hem nature in hir corages:
Than longen folk to goon on pilgrimages,
And palmers for to seken straunge strondes,
To ferne halwes, couthe in sondry londes;
And specially, from every shires ende        15
Of Engelond, to Caunterbury they wende,
The holy blisful martir for to seke,
That hem hath holpen, whan that they were seke. 

Thank you for reading 👉🏼👈🏼😌

attributes.title: Disgusted 🤮
attributes.review: I hate this app so much,  the music was terrible, they gave no useful information and it GLITCHES MY PHONE my phone powers on and off, my screen glitches, automatically screen record, makes it take screen shots ETC!!! And this last one is the most HORRIFIC!!!!One night i left my phone on with the app open as I usually do with all my other apps and when i woke up the next morning THERE WHERE ANTS,SPIDERS,LEAF BUGS ON MY PHONE I AM SO DISGUSTED THEY WHERE IN MY HAIR ON MY ARM YALL DISGUSTED ME DONT GET THIS APP WASTE OF YOUR TIME!!!

attributes.title: extremely disappointed
attributes.review: this app is complete 🅿️🅾️🅾️🅿️. i wanted to come on here to support the man in charge 🍊🍊🍊😜😎😎😌😌💅💅✋✋. sadly i was unable too, because the app took way to long to install !! (about a day or two). then after that, my phone ruptured like an earthquake and flew out my window! i was in utter shock as the bright blue light sent a blur through my backyard. i new i had to retrieve my device so i ran outside and into my backyard. before i could get there, my phone blew up! and a hologram of donald trumps face was projected in the middle of my yard! it was so astonishing to see, and it gave me major ptsd. this happened about a week ago and i am still seeing my therapist about this... so disappointed. 😔😔😔.

attributes.title: Worst app don’t recommend
attributes.review: Worst app took hours to download the screen was completely white right after I opened it it took 30 minutes to load and it was terrible terrible experience terrible music to my ears if you download good luck so I guess you’ll delete right after terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible terrible DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤬🤬🤬
attributes.review: This app took soo long to download. I have great WiFi and it took a few days to download. I even deleted a few apps to have enough storage for this. Opening the app was such a pain because my phone started bugging out. Later realized my phone had a virus and had to reset my entire phone. I still couldn’t remove it so I had to replace the phone. It cost me $150 to replace it. Soo much for a free app. -44 out of 5 stars. DO NOT GET THE APP!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I wish I could give it 0 stars! The app took hours to download and when it finally came up and I made and account it said my email was invalid!!!! So I made a new email and FINALLY got in. But when I got in this god awful music started to play and it made my dog cry. I turned down my volume and started looking around the app. The app had racist and homophobic slander all over it!! I’m very disturbed the USA president would post such nasty things :(
